data.price: Wala msilegee, wala msihuzunike, kwani nyinyi ndio wa juu mkiwa ni Waumini.
data.arabic: وَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَلَا تَحۡزَنُواْ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ
data.footnotes: Wala nyinyi msilegelege mkadhoofika katika Jihadi Fi Sabili Llahi kwa yanayo kupateni, na wala msihuzunike kwa wanao uliwa miongoni mwenu, kwani nyinyi kwa msaada wa Mwenyezi Mungu na Imani yenu na nguvu za Haki mnayo ipigania mko juu. Ushindi ni wenu ikiwa Imani yenu ni ya kweli, na maadamu mtadumu nayo.

meta.transliteration: walā tahinū walā taḥzanū wa-antumu al-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minīna

dua.name: Dua for Resilience
dua.significanceReason: Encourages believers to maintain hope, strength, and emotional resilience during challenging times. Promotes psychological and spiritual endurance.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
